definition: having a robust muscular body-build characterized by predominance of structures (bone and muscle and connective tissue) developed from the embryonic mesodermal layer
details:
adjective
- having a robust muscular body-build characterized by predominance of structures (bone and muscle and connective tissue) developed from the embryonic mesodermal layer
= synonyms: mesomorphic
- having or suggesting great physical power or force
= example: having or suggesting great physical power or force
- possessing physical strength and weight
= example: possessing physical strength and weight
= synonyms: hefty
- of or relating to or consisting of muscle
= example: of or relating to or consisting of muscle
